chart.title: Average height of men by year of birth
chart.subtitle: Mean height of adult men by year of birth. Data for the latest cohort (the year 1996) is therefore the mean height of men aged 18 in 2014.

Mean male height (cm).citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
Mean male height (cm).citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Mean male height (cm)” [dataset]. NCD RisC, Human Height (2017) [original data].
